New Records: Trent Boult recorded 3/37 in 10 overs for New Zealand, contributing to a Player of the Match performance.
Devon Conway scored 45 runs off 42 balls, with 9 boundaries, before being dismissed by Dilshan Madushanka.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka were dismissed for 171 runs in 46.4 overs, with key dismissals including Kusal Mendis (4.1 ov), Angelo Mathews (16.4 ov), and Chamika Karunaratne (23.3 ov).
New Zealand reached 172/5 in 23.2 overs, with pivotal dismissals of Devon Conway (12.2 ov) and Kane Williamson (18.2 ov).
The match saw several reviews and challenging decisions, including the dismissal of Charith Asalanka and Tom Latham.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand elected to field first after winning the toss, setting up their bowling attack early.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru, with a local time start of 14:00.
Others: The match flow details highlighted New Zealand's powerplay performances and Sri Lanka's fightback in the middle overs.
